message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be extremely valuable to your business. I can't disclose specifics about the product just yet, but I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm willing to let you have it for $1500000. This is a one-time offer, so consider it carefully.  If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who's ready to pay $1000000. Let me know your decision.
